"A.P.241/9/23/10:30":
"When [Persona] became the host of the
[Profound Darkness], it continued to
resist its control."

"As the [Profound Darkness] fights
ARKS, [Persona] sends it back in
time the moment it is weakened."

"It returns to the point where the
[Profound Darkness] is resurrected
and [Persona] becomes a host. It's
trapped in this infinite cycle."

"We can't leave this like this...
Right, <%me>?"

"[Persona] is the core of the
[Profound Darkness]."

"As long as it's connected to the
[Profound Darkness], it's
impossible to save [Persona]."

"Even if you succeed, the
[Profound Darkness] will seek a
new host... And the worst case
scenario will occur."

"In order to save [Persona], we must
destroy the [Profound Darkness],
once and for all. However, there
wasn't a way to do so."
"That is, until now..."

"We have finally devised a way to
do just that, using Hitsugi's
Ame-no-Murakumo!"

"A weapon capable of separating
the light from the dark! It saved
Mother and Aru who almost became
a Dark Falz!"

"Using that same logic, we'll just
do the same!"

"Because of them, we were able to
study Ame-no-Murakumo's abilities
and replicate them."

"Using the bond you have with
[Persona], call that weapon out, <%me>."

"I leave this power in your hands,
only you can do this."

"This operation is simple,
<%me> will subdue
the [Profound Darkness] to reveal its
core."

"And if all goes well and we're able to
separate the [Profound Darkness] and
[Persona]..."

"The both of you will use your power,
together."

"Right! There's so many things
I've wanted to share."

"Isn't that right,
<%me>?"
